name: Kikimora
description: A Medium-sized fey known for its chaotic nature and ability to manipulate environments with its unique abilities.
memorable: Its ability to teleport and summon swarms makes it a formidable foe in tight situations.
goals: Typically aims to deceive and manipulate others for its own amusement or benefit.
relations: May be found alongside other fey creatures, or creatures that share a chaotic nature.
environment: Usually inhabits structures, especially living spaces where it can hide and navigate easily.
strengths: High Dexterity and Charisma, making it excellent in stealth and persuasion.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks, which can bypass its physical resistances.
attacks: Performs Multiattack with three claw attacks, dealing slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Hidden Home allows it to teleport to an extradimensional space for evasion and surprise.
senses: Passive Perception of 13, allowing for decent awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Excels in Deception, Persuasion, and Stealth, with notable proficiencies in social manipulation.
additional_information: Can summon swarms to aid in combat through House Pests ability.
Has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects due to Magic Resistance.
Can turn invisible until it attacks, making it hard to target.
Able to cast various utility spells at will, enhancing versatility.
Incredibly mobile within structures, frequently using Homeward Step to escape danger.
spellcasting: Can cast mending, minor illusion, and prestidigitation cantrips at will using Charisma.
test_queries: chaotic creature that can summon swarms
deceptive fey creature that turns invisible
fey that uses magic and stealth
mischievous creature that hides in buildings
